title: Horizon Courts Website
description: A modern and responsive tennis club website built using React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS. Focused on clean UI, responsiveness, and smooth user experience.

title: Alvy Studio Responsive Website
description: A fully responsive studio website created as a frontend project, showcasing modern layout techniques and clean SCSS-based styling.

title: Virtual Piano
description: An interactive virtual piano built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Supports keyboard input and produces real-time sound effects.

title: Cohort 2.0 Practice Repository
description: A collection of frontend and backend practice tasks completed during the Cohort 2.0 program, focusing on strengthening core development skills.

title: Resume
description: A simple and clean HTML-based resume showcasing my skills, education, and projects.
